metadata.title: CVE-2024-35369 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In FFmpeg version n6.1.1, specifically within the avcodec/speexdec.cmodule, a potential security vulnerability exists due to insufficientvalidation of certain parameters when parsing Speex codec extradata. Thisvulnerability could lead to integer overflow conditions, potentiallyresulting in undefined behavior or crashes during the decoding process.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
